column2: Please update Amasty Base module. Re-upload it and replace all the files.

column1: Enable mage-menu-pagebuilder module to activate PageBuilder and Mega Menu integration. Please, run the following command in the SSH: composer require amasty/mega-menu-page-builder
column2: Enable mage-menu-pagebuilder module to activate PageBuilder and Mega Menu integration. Please, run the following command in the SSH: composer require amasty/mega-menu-page-builder

column1: Enable mega-menu-graphql module to activate GraphQl and Mega Menu. Please, run the following command in the SSH: composer require amasty/mega-menu-graphql
column2: Enable mega-menu-graphql module to activate GraphQl and Mega Menu. Please, run the following command in the SSH: composer require amasty/mega-menu-graphql

column1: You can use the menu item Add Content for showing child categories.

column1: Other options are available only for the main categories.
column2: Other options are available only for the main categories.

column1: This option is only available for desktop slider. For mobile content slider this setting is ignored.
column2: This option is only available for desktop slider. For mobile content slider this setting is ignored.

column1: Show Product Options & 'Add to Cart' Button
column2: Show Product Options & 'Add to Cart' Button

column1:
Time in seconds between the widget updates.
If not set, equals to 86400 seconds (24 hours). To update widget instantly, go to Cache Management and clear Blocks HTML Output cache.
Widget will not show products that begin to match the specified conditions until cache is refreshed.
column2:
Time in seconds between the widget updates.
If not set, equals to 86400 seconds (24 hours). To update widget instantly, go to Cache Management and clear Blocks HTML Output cache.
Widget will not show products that begin to match the specified conditions until cache is refreshed.

column1: Item will be displayed without any content.
column2: Item will be displayed without any content.

column1:

                                 Use PNG files to utilize color change on hover. When using PNG files please make sure that the image doesn't have a background.

column1: Category will be displayed without any content, including subcategories
column2: Category will be displayed without any content, including subcategories

column1: If the value is 0, the number of columns equals to the number of child categories. The maximum is 10.
column2: If the value is 0, the number of columns equals to the number of child categories. The maximum is 10.
